cast.name: 帕查楠·贾吉拉乔特 Patchanan Jiajirachote
苏帕蓬·尤多坎扎纳 Suppapong Udomkaewkanjana
多姆·海特拉库 Dom Haetrakul
坦纳·查博里拉 Thana Chatborirak
帕奥佩茨·查伦舒克  Paopetch Charoensook
陂诺皮帕·帕塔纳汕他侬 Pronpiphat Pattanasettanon
披差娅帕·那塔 Pichayapa Natha
艾莎丽·塔拉顾琵帕 Aissaree Tharakoolphipat

introduction: Heaven Condominium might seem like a great place to live, but it soon becomes the site of a horrible tragedy. After someone living in the complex contracts a strange disease that causes a violent, zombie-like affliction, authorities lock it down to prevent the spread—with its inhabitants still inside. To try and stop the epidemic, police officers Run and Prat move in, but they soon find that their mission is more difficult than it seems. As the infection continues to spread, the condo residents grow aggressive toward each other, prioritizing their own survival above all else. Can Run and Prat find a way to deescalate the situation before it's too late?
